Generation III.Ruby: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pok é mon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by Swellow 's clawed feet, preventing escape.
Generation III.Sapphire: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other's wings.
Generation III.Emerald: A Swellow dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.
Generation III.FireRed: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
Generation III.LeafGreen: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
